cs213.photoAlbum.control

Interface PhotoAlbumControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Control

    public interface PhotoAlbumControl
    Interface defining the necessary methods for the PhotoAlbum control.
    Author:
    Jason Davis and Michael Newman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPhoto(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String caption, java.lang.String albumName)
      Creates and adds a photo to the given album.
      void addTag(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String tagDetails)
      Adds a tag to the photo with the given file name.
      void createAlbum(java.lang.String albumName)
      Creates an album with the given album name for the current user.
      void deleteAlbum(java.lang.String albumName)
      Deletes the album with the given album name from the current user.
      void deleteTag(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String tagDetails)
      Deletes the tag with the given tag details from the photo with the given file name.
      void getPhotosByDate(java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate)
      Prints photo information for photos taken within the given range of dates in chronological order.
      void getPhotosByTag(java.lang.String[] tagDetailsArray)
      Prints photo information for photos with all the given tags.
      void listAlbums()
      Prints album information of all albums for the current user.
      void listPhotoInfo(java.lang.String fileName)
      Prints file name, album name(s), date, caption and tag information for a given photo.
      void listPhotos(java.lang.String albumName)
      Prints photo information of all photos in the given album.
      void logout()
      Saves the current user information and exits the program.
      void movePhoto(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String oldAlbum, java.lang.String newAlbum)
      Moves a photo from one existing album to another.
      void removePhoto(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String albumName)
      Deletes the photo with the given file name from the given album.
